exceptions.tactic: intros T F Filter_F P H.
apply filter_imp with (Q := fun x : T => True).
exceptions.exn: The reference T was not found in the current environment.
The reference H was not found in the current environment.

In environment G : AbelianGroup u, v : nat -> G n : nat Unable to unify "?F (fun _ : ?T => True)" with "AbelianGroup.mixin_of (sum_n (fun k : nat => plus (u k) (v k)) n = plus (sum_n u n) (sum_n v n))".

original: intros T F Filter_F P H. apply filter_imp with (Q := fun x : T => True). - intros x _. apply H. - apply filter_true.
